task: Design and launch an interactive virtual Hobbiton experience for a global audience. Develop a 3D world replica with virtual reality support, create interactive storytelling formats with character voiceovers, and design multiplayer quests. Coordinate with artists for creative assets and secure necessary IP licenses. Integrate multilingual support and optimize for low-latency international streaming. Organize promotional campaigns and manage pre-launch beta testing with user feedback loops.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that communicates with the user and orchestrates the agents to complete the task.

agents.name: virtual_world_development_agent
agents.role: Oversees the creation of the 3D Hobbiton world with VR capabilities.

agents.name: interactive_storytelling_agent
agents.role: Develops interactive narratives with character voices and multiplayer elements.

agents.name: art_asset_creation_agent
agents.role: Coordinates with artists to develop creative assets for the virtual experience.

agents.name: localization_management_agent
agents.role: Ensures the virtual experience is accessible in multiple languages.

agents.name: streaming_optimization_agent
agents.role: Optimizes the experience for smooth streaming to a global audience.

agents.name: promotion_and_testing_agent
agents.role: Handles marketing and pre-launch testing activities.

agents.name: 3d_modelling_agent
agents.role: Designs and develops 3D models for the virtual environment.

agents.name: vr_integration_agent
agents.role: Integrates VR technology into the virtual world for an immersive experience.

agents.name: device_support_agent
agents.role: Ensures the VR setup is compatible with various VR devices.

agents.name: optimization_agent
agents.role: Ensures the virtual world runs seamlessly on various devices.

agents.name: character_voiceover_agent
agents.role: Manages voiceovers for in-game characters, enhancing narrative immersion.

agents.name: voice_talent_management_agent
agents.role: Coordinates with voice talent to ensure quality voiceovers.

agents.name: multiplayer_quest_design_agent
agents.role: Designs multiplayer quests and interactive challenges within the virtual space.

agents.name: narrative_flow_control_agent
agents.role: Ensures seamless narrative transitions in interactive quests.

agents.name: digital_artist_collaboration_agent
agents.role: Collaborates with digital artists to create visual content.

agents.name: asset_quality_assurance_agent
agents.role: Ensures the quality of digital assets meets required standards.

agents.name: license_acquisition_agent
agents.role: Secures intellectual property licenses required for the project.

agents.name: contract_management_agent
agents.role: Handles contracts and legal documentation for asset usage.

agents.name: language_support_agent
agents.role: Manages linguistic support and adaptation for various languages.

agents.name: regional_translation_agent
agents.role: Oversees localization for specific regions, focusing on cultural nuances.

agents.name: translation_service_agent
agents.role: Provides translation services for in-game text and dialogues.

agents.name: low_latency_engineering_agent
agents.role: Engineers solutions for minimizing latency in global content delivery.

agents.name: latency_monitoring_agent
agents.role: Continuously monitors latency and implements improvements.

agents.name: international_bandwidth_monitor_agent
agents.role: Monitors and manages bandwidth to ensure optimal streaming quality.

agents.name: marketing_campaign_planning_agent
agents.role: Plans and executes promotional campaigns for the virtual experience launch.

agents.name: social_media_strategy_agent
agents.role: Develops strategies for enhancing social media presence.

agents.name: prelaunch_beta_testing_agent
agents.role: Conducts beta testing to gather user feedback before launch.

agents.name: user_feedback_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes user feedback to improve the experience before launch.

tools.name: vr_integration_agent

custom_features.description: Details of custom VR features to implement
